text:
Hey, everybody. Sorry we're late.
We got caught doing a bunch of stuff.
Or not doing a bunch of stuff.

Okay, Manny is going to be here soon, 
so let's go over the plan.

When we hear him coming, 
we turn off the light.

Then when he comes in and turns it on, 
we all scream,
Surprise!
You got a pen? I want to write this down.
He's coming up the driveway.
He's here early.
Hurry up!
Hurry, hurry!
Shh...
Quick! I don't want the neighbors to see us.

You're sure we're alone?
- Yeah. They're not home till six.

Good. Because I wanted to give you a 
birthday present.
Actually, I'd like to see your face.
Ah!

It's harsh, I know. I've begged them 
to put in a dimmer.
No.
Surprise.

Ruin the greatest moment of my life?
Thanks again Mom.

And the surprise becomes the surpriser. 
This party had everything.
Honey.
Manny, please come out.

Unless you're here to cut a food slot on my door, 
you can leave now.
Nobody's going to make fun of you.
Kids make fun of you, if you get a haircut.
I just gave them a full blown sex scandal.
Oh, everybody's so excited to celebrate with you.

Ay no. The baby was ready, 
but I was not.

It was bad enough that Manny
had to share his mother.
I couldn't let him share a birthday, too.
You stay in there.
I thought you wanted me to come out?

I do, I do. Come out.
We've stole you a beautiful birthday cake!
Gloria.
Tag out. Let me give it a shot.
Yes, you fix it.

Look, I'm not going to sugarcoat this, kid.

Go away.
But there's an upside.

is you get to tell your friends.
The problem is, they never believe you.
But you had witnesses.

Huh. We're gonna be talking about this one 
for years to come, aren't we?
You said it, Kenny.
Manny seems to me like a like a real old soul.
Kenny is amazing at telling the age of a soul.
Aw. Thanks, babe.

Age is nothing but a state of mind, you know?
- Yeah.

I mean, I'm probably more of a

And believe me, I know fourteen year olds.
He has a fourteen year old daughter.
Oh, yeah.
Oh, cool.

Oh, honey, you don't have to do that.

Just keep practicing.

and obviously, I was wrong.

I clicked with the students.

we dunk a cookie together.

then presents, then cake.
